translation.de: und einer der größten in der Geschichte des Landes. Ich gehe zum Klo.

translation.en: [Rylett] The investigation has spanned over eight years
translation.de: Die Ermittlung läuft seit acht Jahren

translation.en: and is one of the largest joint operations
ever undertaken by interstate agencies.
translation.de: staatsübergreifenden Operationen, die es je gab.

translation.en: Peter Morley was born to a normal, middle-class military family.
translation.de: Peter Morley wurde in eine mittelständische Militärfamilie geboren.

translation.en: There is no evidence to suggest as a child Peter Morley was the subject of abuse.
translation.de: Es gibt keine Beweise, dass Peter Morley als Kind Gegenstand von Missbrauch war.

translation.en: This investigation has completely disproved Morley's alibi…
translation.de: Diese Ermittlung hat Morleys Alibi völlig widerlegt…

translation.en: [Mark] He's just gone to the bathroom.
[Rylett] …and has unearthed the full details
of his previous assault of a child in the Northern Territory
translation.de: seines früheren Übergriffs auf ein Kind im NT aufgedeckt,

translation.en: for which he served two years in jail.
translation.de: für den er zwei Jahre in Haft saß.

translation.en: Lights, please.
This child was taken from a family crisis center in the NT in 1996.
translation.de: Dieses Kind wurde 1996 aus einem Auffangzentrum im NT entführt.

translation.en: He was not known to the offender.
Attending doctors observed that the child
had lacerations and abrasions to his legs, arms and torso.
translation.de: Platz- und Schürfwunden an Beinen, Armen und Oberkörper hatte.

translation.en: His hair, face and body were covered in dirt,
translation.de: Sein Haar, Gesicht und Körper waren von Dreck bedeckt

translation.en: with blood present in the nose and mouth.
translation.de: und er hatte Blut an Nase und Mund.

translation.en: He had blackened eyes,
several closed fractures,
a collapsed lung,
severe bruises beneath his hairline,
and deep cuts to his scalp and genitalia.
translation.de: und tiefe Schnitte an Skalp und Genitalien.

translation.en: The overall pattern indicated widespread and repeated applications
translation.de: Das Gesamtmuster deutete auf verbreitete und wiederholte

translation.en: of both blunt and sharp-force trauma.
Contusions to the throat
in association with hemorrhaging in the eyes
translation.de: in Verbindung mit Blutungen in den Augen

translation.en: was indicative of suffocation.
He was found barely alive in the remnants of a burnt-out car
translation.de: Er wurde fast tot in den Überresten eines ausgebrannten Autos gefunden,

translation.en: less than 100 meters from where he was taken.
translation.de: weniger als 100 Meter vom Ort der Entführung.

translation.en: On returning to the site of the abduction,
translation.de: Als er zum Ort der Entführung zurückkam,

translation.en: Peter Morley offered to lead the search for the person responsible.
translation.de: bot Peter Morley an, bei der Suche nach dem Verantwortlichen zu helfen.

translation.en: -[knocking on door] -[flight attendant] Hello?
-Are you okay? -[Henry] I'm fine.
-[flight attendant] Sorry. -Nah.
Thought you'd fallen in.
I can't fuckin' breathe, man. I can't fuckin' breathe.
translation.de: Ich kann verdammt noch mal nicht atmen.

translation.en: -Yeah, you can. -Nah. Yeah, you can.
Ready? [inhales deeply]
[officer] I want to raise a few issues here.
Regardless of his assault on this other child,
translation.de: Abgesehen vom Angriff auf das andere Kind

translation.en: in this case, the timelines are thin,
even with the break in his alibi.
We're talking about an hour to abduct a person--
translation.de: Wir reden von einer Stunde für die Entführung…

translation.en: I have to be clear, this is a practiced offender
-who's placed himself at the scene-- -You've been clear.
translation.de: -der zugab, vor Ort gewesen… -Das sagten Sie.

translation.en: -You've had your time. Now sit down. -I want to clarify something.
translation.de: -Sie hatten Ihre Zeit. Hinsetzen. -Ich will was klären.

translation.en: Let's have some contention in the process.
I want to clarify something. The duration of the assault in the NT?
translation.de: Ich will was klären: Die Dauer des Angriffs im NT.

translation.en: Fifteen minutes.
[Henry] There's never been anyone locked up in Queensland without a body.
translation.de: In Queensland wurde nie jemand ohne Leiche eingesperrt.

translation.en: New South Wales there has. Not here.
translation.de: In New South Wales schon. Hier nicht.

translation.en: I, um… I mentioned the yard where you talked about shredding the cars.
translation.de: Ich erwähnte den Hof, wo du erwähntest, Autos zu verschrotten.

translation.en: Is that somewhere that we should head to?
-[Henry] Nah, mate. -I just thought maybe--
No, Mark, no.
What were you wearing on the day?
translation.de: Was trugst du an dem Tag?

translation.en: I threw it all on the fire, burnt it all, shoes as well.
translation.de: Ich hab alles verbrannt, Schuhe auch.

translation.en: -[Cross] There's nothing left? -Nothing left. Nothing.
-[Cross] Where are the ashes? -I threw them out on the lawn
translation.de: Na ja, war da Asche? Hab sie im Gras verteilt

translation.en: and then I got the dirt ripped up and taken away, so…
translation.de: und den Rasen dann rausreißen lassen, also…

translation.en: [chuckles] Fuckin' well done.
[chuckles] That's gold. Fuckin' gold.
I didn't mean to do it, though. I didn't know it would happen.
translation.de: Ich hatte aber nicht vor, es zu tun.

translation.en: It's like how the words are coming out of me mouth now,
translation.de: So wie die Worte, die jetzt aus mir kommen,

translation.en: like how I'm saying it to you now, like it's nothing.
translation.de: so wie ich es euch erzähle, als wäre es nichts.

translation.en: -[Cross] How far from here? -[Henry] Not far.
translation.de: Wie weit von hier? Nicht weit.

translation.en: That's my old church there.
That's where I was married.
Don't know what I was fuckin' thinkin' of at the time. [chuckles]
translation.de: Weiß nicht, was ich damals dachte. Scheiße.

translation.en: -This is where I picked him up, here. -[indicator clicking]
No, don't fuckin' pull over. There's a camera there.
translation.de: Verdammt, fahr nicht ran. Da ist eine Kamera.

translation.en: There's a camera there, mate.
Just keep going.
[officer 1] This isn't about whether he did it.
It's about whether or not it's prosecutable.
translation.de: Sondern darum, ob es vor Gericht hält.

translation.en: And you can talk about an unsolicited confession all you like.
translation.de: Sie können ruhig über ein ungebetenes Geständnis reden.

translation.en: This undercover operation induces a suspect to confess.
translation.de: Diese verdeckte Ermittlung veranlasst Verdächtige zum Geständnis.

translation.en: It's inducement without evidence.
[Henry] This is where I threw his clothes.
translation.de: Hier warf ich seine Kleidung hin.

translation.en: [Mark] There's nothing here.
That's good.
I strongly submit that we continue the covert operation
translation.de: Ich plädiere dafür, dass wir die Ermittlung

translation.en: while the area's being searched
because if you go for an arrest without evidence
translation.de: absuchen, denn wenn Sie ihn festnehmen

translation.en: and you find nothing, he walks.
translation.de: und keine Beweise finden, ist er frei.

translation.en: I refuse to put the victim's family through that for nothing.
translation.de: Ich weigere mich, die Angehörigen dem auszusetzen.

translation.en: As you're aware, the commissioner has tasked me
translation.de: Wie Sie wissen, hat der Commissioner

translation.en: with making a decision as to whether or not an arrest is to take place.
translation.de: mich beauftragt, zu entscheiden, ob es zur Festnahme kommt.

translation.en: Without evidence, he walks.
[officer 2] And that will be my decision to make.
translation.de: Und das wird meine Entscheidung sein.

translation.en: [Henry] Just pull in up there.
[Cross] Is this it?
Yep.
[Cross] So this is where the demountable was?
-Yeah. -[Cross] So you killed him in there…
translation.de: Ja. Du hast ihn da drin getötet…

translation.en: and you dragged him down where?
I don't remember that water being there.
translation.de: Ich erinnere mich nicht an das Wasser.

translation.en: It was here though.
Here.
You sure?
Yeah, there's nothing.
[Cross] It's all right.
[officer yelling] Hold it there! Hold it there!
Stay where you are, mate! Just stay where you are!
Thank you all for your attendance.
I'll let you know at the outset that we won't be able to answer any questions.
translation.de: Ich sage gleich zu Beginn, dass wir keine Fragen beantworten können.

translation.en: I can confirm that earlier today, an arrest was made
in relation to the disappearance of James Liston on May 12, 2002.
translation.de: eine Festnahme im Entführungsfall James Liston erfolgt ist.

translation.en: Police are currently securing a large area in anticipation of an extensive search.
translation.de: Wir sichern gerade ein weites Gebiet für eine umfangreiche Suche.

translation.en: The search area itself is located in the Queensland floodplain.
translation.de: Das Suchgebiet selbst liegt in der Flussaue Queenslands.

translation.en: The issue that we are facing is that flooding over the past eight years
translation.de: Wir haben das Problem, dass die Flut in den letzten acht Jahren

translation.en: may have removed any remaining evidence.
[John] Henry Teague.
As informed earlier,
you're here under arrest with regard to the abduction of James Liston
translation.de: sind Sie verhaftet wegen der Entführung James Listons

translation.en: on the 12th May, 2002.
I haven't done this, you know. Nothin' to do with me, mate.
translation.de: Ich war das nicht. Hat nichts mit mir zu tun.

translation.en: As long as you didn't do it, there'll be no evidence
and you've got nothing to worry about.
translation.de: und Sie haben keinen Grund zur Sorge.

translation.en: Now, you got a minute. Anything you need?
translation.de: Sie haben eine Minute. Brauchen Sie was?

translation.en: Anyone got a smoke?
[Rylett] We'll be undertaking a basic search of the forest covering.
translation.de: Wir führen eine einfache Suche der Waldbedeckung durch.

translation.en: We have around four acres to manage.
Additional Forensics are searching the demountable
which was relocated when the site sold
and where it's alleged that the victim was killed.
translation.de: und wo das Opfer angeblich getötet wurde.

translation.en: Don't disturb potential evidence.
If you come across anything, pause and raise your hand.
translation.de: Wenn ihr etwas findet, pausiert und hebt eine Hand.

translation.en: -[Cross] How we looking? -[forensic coordinator] Found nothing.
-Nothing at all? -No.
The divers have finished with the lake, but no, nothing.
translation.de: Die Taucher sind im See fertig. Nichts.

translation.en: [Mark] No, hold on.
It's night.
I'm in my house.
My son is asleep in his room.
translation.de: Mein Sohn schläft in seinem Zimmer.

translation.en: And I hear a voice.
It's coming from downstairs.
I walk toward it.
I can barely breathe.
It's not a person talking.
It's a tape recorder.
I press the button to turn it off.
But when I turn it off…
the voice keeps coming…
…keeps talking.
